attributes.action: Consider a total reform of all the police departments:48 civilian police forces.
attributes.additional_details: Because reforms can only be done by Parliament.
attributes.background: Public enquiry into the effectiveness of the police force in the UK.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about police forces in the UK, but we're not sure what you mean by 'effectiveness', nor what kinds of reforms you want this inquiry to consider.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Establish a statutory public inquiry into British police culture: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610518
